original_title: ตลาดพรหมจารี
overview: The story of a young woman growing up in a broken family, her fatal fate begins with her real father, who bets her to sell her as a salesman just because she has no money to spend on both. She is a pure girl who can be saved from the brothel. But there is no reason to go to work in a brothel.  She will have to start a new life with her lover. Is everything going as hoped?
title: Virgin Market
